apps.name: revanced-extended-mnml
apps.changeLog:
Music: 7.16.53  
Reddit: 2024.17.0  
YouTube: 19.16.39  

Install [MicroG](https://github.com/ReVanced/GmsCore/releases) to be able to use non-root YouTube or YouTube-Music.  
Use [zygisk-detach](https://github.com/j-hc/zygisk-detach) to block Play Store from updating YouTube and YouTube-Music.  

[Main Repo](https://github.com/NoName-exe/revanced-extended-mnml)  
CLI: inotia00/revanced-cli-4.6.2-all.jar  
Integrations: inotia00/revanced-integrations-1.16.1.apk  
Patches: inotia00/revanced-patches-4.16.1.jar  
[Changelog](https://github.com/inotia00/revanced-patches/releases/tag/v4.16.1)

apps.author: CappielloAntonio
apps.name: Tempo
apps.changeLog:
> The release on F-Droid will follow shortly.
> As always, those who want to contribute by reporting problems or crashes can do so using the version of the app marked as debug.

_Starting from version 3.9.0, the GitHub version of the app has become the primary, first-class citizen. 
It includes full features such as Android Auto and Chromecast support, and it is updatable as it checks GitHub for newer versions.
The version available on F-Droid will continue to exist, but personally I will always prefer the GitHub version for bug fixes and error corrections._

## Changelog
### Features
- Added sorting and search functionality for song list and album/artist list (commit: 9e6926fc, 48d9022f)
- Implemented additional sorting options for albums in the catalog screen (commit: 780f1c3a)
- Added search functionality for songs within playlists (commit: 0f471a7b)
- **Added ALAC codec support via Media3 FFmpeg module** (commit: 4ec15190)
- **Implemented continuous playing** (commit: 176db096, e84f6222)
- **Added the ability for the user to add a local server address and use it when available** (commit: f6b176a3)
- Added long press to delete gesture (commit: 078aa875)
- Added release date and original release date to album notes, if available (commit: 54a43557)
- **Implemented version number control and update dialog for Github flavor** (commit: 0a26f0a7)
- Added memory cache option (commit: 477331da)
- Updated the horizontal song adapter with the disc name information (commit: b3b1c5b0)
- Extended the Albums model according to the OpenSubsonic API project indications (commit: 25900c84)
- Added the ability to pin playlists to the home screen (commit: fb7296b4)
- Clicking the song's title now opens the album on the player (commit: 7c87ec2c)
- Added an API call to retrieve AlbumID3 details in the album page (commit: 2c3aebc8)

### Fixes
- Fixed the server address change to backup address if the first one is unreachable (commit: e8e24354)
- Fixed null checking in multiple places (commit: e305f208, c8c1bcfd, e1c96d27, 67e40797, 263d9ebc)
- Fixed escape character issue (commit: 3783a2f7)
- Removed deprecated code to check connectivity (commit: d3ca43ed)
- Fixed order of downloaded tracks by artist, album, disc_number, and track number (commit: 4448a632)
- Fixed null checking to prevent crashes (commit: 67e40797)
- Fixed setAllowCrossProtocolRedirects to httpDataSourceFactory (commit: 08e9be10)
- Set content description to floating action button (commit: 6cbb2ee1)

### Other Changes
- Dependencies and Gradle updates (commits: 0b92c40d, 618cf23e, b1e0f49d, fd0fd054, 4d1213c4, 240498c2, 2db716a7, 618cf23e, a49c78b9)
- Code cleanup and style improvements (commits: 6f51fd92, aa5290c7, 41b374ab, dacaa03e)
- Translations: Updated Russian, Italian, and Chinese (commit: eb6a2b60, 20ffc960, 85403486, 049ce771, 73a1ab23, 436ef21a)

The next version of the app will focus on optimizations, from list loadings to display items - I'll try to simplify as much as possible.

apps.author: breezy-weather
apps.name: Breezy Weather
apps.changeLog:
**If you donâ€™t know what to do, download and install `breezy-weather-v6.0.11-rc_standard.apk`, or check [INSTALL instructions](https://github.com/breezy-weather/breezy-weather/blob/main/INSTALL.md) for more details.**

**Improvements and fixes**
- Fix crash when entering Appearance settings using 12-hour format with scheduled dark mode
- Current location - Fix details sometimes not saved to database (previous location details restored on restart of the app)
- Remove animations in the pressure block as it caused flickering
- Change default distance unit for Germany to kilometer, as per DWD usage
- Change default speed unit for Netherlands to meter per second, as per KNMI usage
- Fix threshold value for scattered cloud cover (@cloneofghosts)

**Translations**
- Translations updated

---

apps.author: TechbeeAT
apps.name: jtx Board
apps.changeLog:
- In the compact view subtasks can now be collapsed and expanded (if the option "Expand subtasks in list" is disabled). ATTENTION: So far this option was disabled. If you want to ALWAYS display subtasks, please make sure to enable the option in the settings to keep the view as it was.
- Fixed overlapping keyboard on Android 16
- Fixed crash when location contains single quotes
- Minor improvements
- Version updates

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/TechbeeAT/jtxBoard/compare/v2.12.0...v2.12.1

apps.author: thunderbird
apps.name: Thunderbird
apps.changeLog:
New:
- Account initials now use the display name, improving customizability
- Account icons remain in the same position when selected
- Help text linking to support page added for Gmail login issues


Changed:
- The IMAP ID command uses "Thunderbird for Android" for better distinction from Thunderbird Desktop
- Unified inbox enabled only when multiple accounts are configured


Fixed:
- Push service now starts reliably when expected
- Correct default delete message action for QR-imported accounts. Please check your fetch mail settings!
- Multiple crashes addressed
- Folder drawer updates properly on account configuration changes
- Startup differentiates between light and dark themes

Contributors:
- @eltociear made their first contribution in https://github.com/thunderbird/thunderbird-android/pull/8474
- @rohnsha0 made their first contribution in https://github.com/thunderbird/thunderbird-android/pull/8457
- @Its-Aki made their first contribution in https://github.com/thunderbird/thunderbird-android/pull/8546
- @leoheitmannruiz made their first contribution in https://github.com/thunderbird/thunderbird-android/pull/8557
- Thank you also to @cketti, @coreycb, @kewisch, @inattee, @marcRDZ, @monica-thunderbird, @shamim-emon and @wmontwe

Full Changelog: https://github.com/thunderbird/thunderbird-android/compare/THUNDERBIRD_8_1...THUNDERBIRD_8_2

apps.author: home-assistant
apps.name: Home Assistant
apps.changeLog:
## What's Changed
* Lock file maintenance by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5497
* Update dependency com.squareup.okhttp3:okhttp-bom to v5.0.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5481
* Update dependency gradle to v8.14.3 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5503
* Update dependency org.junit:junit-bom to v5.13.3 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5504
* Support strict intent matching by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5483
* Improve error handling when using Response from Retrofit by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5487
* Move includeBuild outside of pluginManagement by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5508
* Handle multiple returns types from renderTemplate by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5506
* Update idea config by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5513
* Enable Github Action on all pull request not only on main by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5521
* Update haze to v1.6.7 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5523
* Apply bottom inset to snackbar in SettingsFragment by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5516
* Add supports to download blob from the WebView by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5515
* Update dependency com.google.gms.google-services to v4.4.3 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5467
* Make gestures configurable (+ breaking: swap left/right) by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5512
* Request PERMISSION_READ_HEALTH_DATA_IN_BACKGROUND for HealtConnectSensor by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5510
* Update dependency com.squareup.okhttp3:okhttp-bom to v5.1.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5530
* Introduce Coroutine Dao functions lint rule by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5526
* Remove intent filter enforcement to unblock Android Auto by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5535
* Lock file maintenance by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5542
* Ignore blank tags for notification ID by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5544
* Update dependency io.sentry:sentry-android-core to v8.17.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5532
* Consistently capitalize one occurrence of 'Companion' in strings.xml by @NoRi2909 in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5547
* Update dependency org.jlleitschuh.gradle.ktlint to v13 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5529
* Support Edge to edge default mode in WebViews by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5507
* Ignore ktlint last change from blame by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5548
* Make settingsDao fully suspensible by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5528
* Make location history dao suspensible by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5552
* Enable edge-to-edge support for BaseActivity by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5387
* Make ThemostatTileDao delete method suspensible by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5554
* Make FavoriteCachesDao methods suspensible by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5551
* Bump target API to 36 ðŸš€ðŸš€ðŸš€ by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5556
* Fix strict mode issues by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5557
* Change action for ManageAssistActivity by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5562
* Update haze to v1.6.8 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5564
* Make Widget DAOs suspensible by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5550
* Fix timestamp being in the future for GPS rollover bug by @Pawik55 in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5563
* Open a PR to update changelog on each weekly workflow by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5558
* Update dependency io.mockk:mockk to v1.14.5 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5568
* Lock file maintenance by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5574
* Update hilt to v2.57 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5571
* Stop exporting components that are not meant to be used externally by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5509
* Update androidx.compose.* by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5570
* Bump changelog_master.xml for weekly release 2025.7.4 by @github-actions[bot] in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5576
* Update haze to v1.6.9 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5575
* Update androidx.* by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5569
* Simplify pattern matching for onTag workflow by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5577
* Replace 'sensor worker' with 'sensor updates (channel)' by @NoRi2909 in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5583
* Add changelog note about last release supporting Android 5.0/5.1 by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5584
* Make SensorDAO methods suspensible by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5517
* Update gesture action selection UI by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5578
* Make ServerDao suspensible by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5545
* Fix webview basic authentication race by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5587
* Make Notification dao suspensible by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5553
* Update dependency org.junit:junit-bom to v5.13.4 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5590
* Make AuthenticationDao suspensible by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5555
* More actions to configure for gestures by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5538
* Lock file maintenance by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5599
* Update coil to v3.3.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5594
* Use on prereleased instead of tag to update changelog by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5600
* Bump changelog_master.xml for weekly release 2025.7.5 by @github-actions[bot] in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5601
* Support update pull request and monthly tag for update changelog version by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5606
* Fix disk violations and enable strict mode threading death penalty by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5591
* Update dependency androidx.navigation:navigation-compose to v2.9.3 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5614
* Extract common configuration + theme from webview by @TimoPtr in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5609
* Lock file maintenance by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/5619

apps.author: bitfireAT
apps.name: DAVxâµ
apps.changeLog:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v4.5.3-ose -->

## What's Changed
### New features
* Follow redirects when adding webdav mount by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1582
* Icons next to CalDAV/CardDAV tab titles by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1599
### Bug fixes
* [Sync framework] Fix sync always pending on Android 14+ by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1463
* Use early entry point for sync adapter services by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1610
* `AndroidSyncFrameworkTest`: allow optional states by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1625
* Correctly handle `SecurityException` for `acquireContentProvider` by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1622
* Fix ETag update logic in QueryChildDocumentsOperation by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1626
### Refactoring
* Update synctools for `AndroidEvent2` by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1601
* [UI] Use "(optional)" in labels to indicate optional textfields  by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1571
* Extract `discoverHomesets()` to `ServiceRefresher` by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1604
* Choose real or fake (for tests) SyncAdapter over DI by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1608
* Extract `refreshHomesetsAndTheirCollections` to `HomeSetRefresher` by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1606
* [WebDAV] Implement command pattern, streamline lifecycle, remove WebdavScope by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1617
* WebDAV: remove notifications, timeout logic by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1630
* Replaced Webcal tab icon in collections list by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1628
### Other changes
* Extract `refreshPrincipals()` to `PrincipalsRefresher` by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1607
* Update dependencies, including AGP by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1632
* Version bump to 4.5.3 by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1637
* Fetch translations from Transifex by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1638


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/compare/v4.5.2.1-ose...v4.5.3-ose

apps.author: immich-app
apps.name: Immich
apps.changeLog:
# v1.123.0 ## Highlights Welcome to release `v1.123.0` of Immich. This is the last release of the year as the team is winding down for the holiday season. Thank you for your support and the fantastic year. We cannot wait to continue adding more features, optimizing, and making Immich a delightful app experience for you and your family. This release fixes bugs in the web and mobile, notably from the recent new native video player. We also add a feature to allow you to change the timeline view order of an album in the mobile app

## Support Immich

If you find the project helpful, you can support Immich by purchasing a product key at https://buy.immich.app/. Cheers! ðŸ» - - - - ## What's Changed ### ðŸš€ Features * feat(server): Merge Faces sorted by Similarity by @Lukasdotcom in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/14635 * feat(album): album view sort order by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/14648 ### ðŸŒŸ Enhancements * feat(server): add Bash healthcheck script by @000yesnt in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/14704 ### ðŸ› Bug fixes * fix(web): live photo link action by @michelheusschen in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/14668 * fix(web): allow minimizing upload panel by @michelheusschen in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/14663 * fix(web): upload info panel covers timeline navigation bar by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/14651 * fix(server): fixed email footer image stretched #14617 by @TimVanOnckelen in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/14671 * fix(mobile): set custom headers on external url (#14707) by @alex-sherwin in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/14708 * fix(mobile): native dialog location by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/14730 * fix(mobile): live photos playback by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/14731 * fix(web): fix missing icons by @aviv926 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/14737 ### ðŸ“š Documentation * docs: improve install/requirements and install/docker-compose by @pyorot in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/13569 * docs: Add more documentation for video transcoding settings. by @kevincox in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/13388 ### ðŸŒ Translations * chore(web): update translations by @weblate in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/14495 ## New Contributors * @alex-sherwin made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/14708 * @000yesnt made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/14704 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/immich-app/immich/compare/v1.122.3...v1.123.0

apps.author: microg
apps.name: Google Play services
apps.changeLog:
## New Features

### Work Profile
You can now sign into various work accounts that setup a work profile when using microG. As microG does not comply with all functionality imposed by organization administrators, you need to enable this feature manually in microG Settings > Work profile. Together with this comes functionality to view and install apps suggested by the organization administrator through the Play Store.

### Play Feature Delivery
Apps can request installation of additional languages or features from split packages. You can activate this from microG Settings > Play Store

### Face detection
This release ships with initial support for Google's Face Detection API. This functionality is still very incomplete, but works for some apps using it.

## Changelog
- Maps: Various fixes for HMS Maps (#2737, #2754, #2778, #2825). Thanks @DaVinci9196.
- Vision: Improve Barcode Scanning APIs (#2735, #2787). Thanks @DaVinci9196.
- Vision: Add initial support for face detection API (#2793). Thanks @DaVinci9196.
- Location: Add support for moving WiFis in Eurostar trains (#2821). Thanks @TimoWilken.
- Fitness: Add dummy for Recording API (#2760). Thanks @DaVinci9196.
- Auth: Various fixes for quick login and third-party Google sign-in (#2660, #2698, #2798). Thanks @DaVinci9196.
- Auth: Add support for work accounts (#2553). Thanks @fynngodau.
- DroidGuard: Disable access to hardware attestation.
- Vending: Fix handling of IAP for multi-account setups (#2681). Thanks @DaVinci9196.
- Vending: Add work app store (#2553). Thanks @fynngodau.
- Vending: Disable access to hardware keys for play integrity (#2740). Thanks @DaVinci9196
- Vending: Add dummys (#2759, #2791). Thanks @DaVinci9196.
- Various fixes to improve support for Google Apps (#2652, #2654, #2684, #2738, #2767, #2779, #2780). Thanks @DaVinci9196.
- Various fixes for dynamic links (#2662), Fido (#2811), SmsRetriever API (#2786), AppSet dummy (#2781), web view handling (#2836, #2862). Thanks @DaVinci9196, @ale5000-git.
- Version bumps (#2813, #2829). Thanks @DaVinci9196, @ale5000-git 
- String and location infrastructure fixes (#2693, #2755, #2781). Thanks @lucasmz-dev, @Fs00.
- New/Updated translations for Turkish, Chinese (Traditional), Portuguese (Brasil), Polish, Swedish, Vietnamese, Dutch, Czech, Serbian, Irish, Romanian, Thai, German, French, Finish, Arabic, Icelandic, Tamil, Russian, Filipino, Uyghur, Ukrainian, Italian, Chinese (Simplified), Spanish, Asturian. Thanks @ysfchn, @xlionjuan, @lucasmz-dev, @rehork, @eson57, @prpjzz, @ruditimmermans, @Fjuro, @aindriu80, @ygorigor, @grenadin, @Atalanttore, @oArthurEmilio, @PatrikSelinGH, @QSkill, @superminyon, @JoekeMeijer, @sveinki, @TamilNeram, @ItsRomeostar, @searinminecraft, @AbduqadirAbliz, @adri0tay,  @Kefir2105, @ale5000-git, @ann9cht, @Suwipe, @HUNTHEAN-Org, @fitojb, and unnamed Weblate translators.
- Full Changelog: https://github.com/microg/GmsCore/compare/v0.3.6.244735...v0.3.7.250932

## New Contributors
- @ysfchn made their first contribution in https://github.com/microg/GmsCore/pull/2453
- @xlionjuan made their first contribution in https://github.com/microg/GmsCore/pull/2840
- @TimoWilken made their first contribution in https://github.com/microg/GmsCore/pull/2821

## Release artifacts
- Users on devices with an aftermarket custom operating system ("Custom ROM") that supports microG should install `com.google.android.gms-250932014.apk` and `com.android.vending-84022614.apk`. These versions are also distributed through the microG F-Droid repository.
- Users on Huawei devices running original operating system (EMUI or HarmonyOS) that supports microG should install `com.google.android.gms-250932014-hw.apk` and `com.android.vending-84022614-hw.apk`. These versions are also distributed through Huawei AppGallery.
- `org.microg.gms-250932014-user.apk` is a development preview for special situations. Do not use it if you want to install microG regularly.

## New Contributors

apps.author: Mahmud0808
apps.name: PixelLauncher Enhanced
apps.changeLog:
## Chagelog:

- Improved drawer row height multiplier with additional steps.
- Fixed shortcut badge hiding on Android 16 Beta 4.
- Resolved crash when hiding status bar on certain launcher versions.
- Fixed random disappearance of dock icons.
- Addressed quick app switching issues when "Clear All" is enabled in specific cases.
- Added per-app language support for PLEnhanced.

Translation credit goes to all the contributors on [our crowdin platform](https://crowdin.com/project/pixellauncher-enhanced).

apps.author: RichardLuo0
apps.name: Global Icon Pack
apps.changeLog:
## ðŸš€ Features

- feat: material expressive init support
- feat: add color preview in shape color
- feat: expressive shapes for dialog button
- feat: preference screen list style change
- feat: updated snackbar visual
- feat: redesign filter
- feat: IconButtonWithTooltip with shapes
- feat: redesigned list item
- feat: add thumb icon to switch
- feat: hide appfilter when scrolling up
- feat: redesigned bottom navigation
- feat: redesigned search bar
- feat: redesigned app icon list page
- feat: redesigned animated fab
- feat: redesigned import/export as fab menu
- feat: scroll indication box around icon chooser grid
- feat(IconChooser): expand search bar only when needed
- feat: ScrollIndicator supports shape
- feat: clear focus on scroll

## ðŸ› Fixes

- fix: force create the preference file and use its selinux context
- fix: option dialog doesn't retain scroll state
- fix: loading circle doesn't fill max size
- fix: scale drawable float precision
- refactor: constant state
- fix: adjust Preference spacing and color
- fix: icons invisible introduced by b11f1d12
- refactor: loading defaults to fillMaxSize()
- fix: scale drawable applies a new bounds instead of canvas scale to eliminate burr
- fix: list item wrong text color
- perf: remove onGloballyPositioned
- fix(MainActivity): avoid overlapping with toolbar
- fix: center search bar
- fix: clear focus after search
- fix(Merger): can only scroll to next page when base pack is selected
- fix(IconChooser): add shadow to RoundSearchBar, change content alignment of its expand transition
- fix: none style icon button does not change shape
- fix: scroll state will reset if bottom sheet is closed
- fix: add clear button to search bar
- fix: next step only shows when base pack is chosen
- fix: ExpandedScrollConnection will expand only when bigger than a threshold
- fix: use md3 default search bar
- fix: clear button will fade out when text is empty
- fix: animations recalibrate

## ðŸ’¬ Other

- chore: change main dropdownmenu leading icons
- chore: upgrade dependency

apps.author: topjohnwu
apps.name: Magisk
apps.changeLog:
- [Core] Fix an edge case breaking modules when overlayfs is involved
- [Core] Fix module `.replace` functionality in certain situations
- [resetprop] Reduce property modification traces

## Diffs to v29.0

- [General] Various minor bug fixes
- [Core] Migrate module implementation to Rust
- [Core] Improve Magisk specific files injection logic
- [MagiskBoot] Migrate compression code to Rust
- [MagiskSU] Add ability to restrict Linux capabilities even if running as root (uid=0)
- [resetprop] Reduce property modification traces

### Full Changelog: [here](https://topjohnwu.github.io/Magisk/changes.html)

apps.author: sunilpaulmathew
apps.name: De-Bloater

Now possible to opt-out from the auto-update check (only at first launch).
Updated Japaneses translations.
Miscellaneous changes.

apps.author: NoName-exe
apps.name: revanced-extended
apps.changeLog:
Music (arm64-v8a): 8.30.54  
Music (arm-v7a): 8.30.54  
YouTube: 19.47.53  

Install [MicroG](https://github.com/ReVanced/GmsCore/releases) to be able to use non-root YouTube or YouTube-Music.  
Use [zygisk-detach](https://github.com/j-hc/zygisk-detach) to block Play Store from updating YouTube and YouTube-Music.  

[Main Repo](https://github.com/NoName-exe/revanced-extended)
  
CLI: j-hc/revanced-cli-5.0.0-all.jar  
Patches: inotia00/patches-5.10.1.rvp  
[Changelog](https://github.com/inotia00/revanced-patches/releases/tag/v5.10.1)
